parse.title: List of the first films by country

text.*:
This article does not cite any sources. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. (March 2017) (Learn how and when to remove this template message)

This is a list of the first films by country. This table shows the earliest known film productions by country, or successor state.

List of the first films by country[edit]

Country Year Silent film Sound recording Colour film Notes
United Kingdom 1888 Roundhay Garden Scene (1888) Algy the Piccadilly Johnny (1900)
Blackmail (1929 film) 		A Visit to the Seaside (1908)
USA 1894 Fred Ott's Sneeze (1894) The Dickson Experimental Sound Film (1895) Joan the Woman (1916)
France 1895 Workers Leaving the Lumière Factory (1895) Le Cid (1900) Vie et Passion du Christ (1903)
Germany 1895 Akrobatisches Potpourri (1895) Death of Othello (1907)
I Kiss Your Hand, Madame (1929) 		Casanova (1928)
Italy The Song of Love (film) (1930) The Last Days of Pompeii (1926 film)
Spain 1896 Salida de la misa de doce de la Iglesia del Pilar de Zaragoza (1896)
Japan 1898 Bake Jizo (1898) Reimai (1926)
Fujiwara Yoshie no furusato (1930) 		Gate of Hell (1953)
Sweden
Denmark 1897

Palestine
